title: Correction to: In-line and Off-axis Electron Holography for the Study of Biological Specimens
content: This is a correction to: Elio Karim, Bumsu Park, Cécile Marcelot, Vanessa Soldan, Stéphanie Balor, Sarah Bals, Amélie Le Forestier, Célia Plisson-Chastang, Christophe Gatel, Pierre-Emmanuel Gleizes, Etienne Snoeck, In-line and Off-axis Electron Holography for the Study of Biological, Microscopy and Microanalysis, Volume 29, Issue Supplement_1, 1 August 2023, Pages 1015–1016, https://doi.org/10.1093/micmic/ozad067.512
